title: Interregional partnership for Smart Specialization on artificial intelligence and human machine interface

author: Miha Glavan, Department of Systems and Control, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: In contrast to the previous presentations, I won't be focusing so much on the specific technology or specific methods and applications.

I will use this opportunity to present the international partnerships for smart specialisation on artificial intelligence and Human Machine interface.
